# AIscreenR: OPEN-AI screening tools in R for systematic reviewing

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of AIscreenR is to OPEN-AI tools to support screening processes (including title and abstract screening) 
in systematic reviews and related literature reviews.

## Installation

You can install the development version of AIscreenR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MikkelVembye/AIscreenR")
```
